New Records: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 30 points and grabbed 12 rebounds in the game.
Key Match Events: The Milwaukee Bucks made a 12-0 run to trim a 19-point deficit in the third quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: Damian Lillard struggled in the first half, missing all seven shots and committing two turnovers.
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee Bucks coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant as the Bucks outscored the Pacers 67-48 in the second half.
Others: The game was played at Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis with 17,274 attendees.
